channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Beware, this fake site offers up a malicious 7-Zip installer laced with malware
item.description: Fake 7zip.com site sounds incredible, but don't be fooled.

item.title: Les ventes de ces smartphones explosent en France, merci la crise de la RAM ?
item.description: Alors que la crise de la RAM freine les envies d'achats des consommateurs, une marque de smartphones enregistre des chiffres record sur 2025.

item.title: TikTok launches an opt-in Local Feed in the U.S. leveraging users’ precise location
item.description: TikTok's new Local Feed will show you nearby shopping, dining, events, news, and more.

item.title: Surveillance de masse : et si les sonnettes Ring traquaient bien plus que des chiens disparus ?
item.description: Comment faire accepter la surveillance de masse ? En mettant les toutous à contribution, pardi ! Ça n'est évidemment pas le message qu'a voulu faire passer Amazon pour faire la promotion des sonnettes connectées Ring, mais c'est celui qu'ont entendu de nombreux internautes craignant le pire pour leur vie privée.

item.title: 'Simple but dangerous’ – Top VPNs targeted by typosquatting as 14% of fake domains found to be malicious
item.description: Major providers including NordVPN, ExpressVPN, and Proton VPN are among those targeted by lookalike domains. Here's how to stay safe.

item.title: ‘A good way of dealing with overpopulation’: Epstein files reveal how the rich fuel climate denialism
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein and his vast network of elite figures routinely traded in myths that undermine climate progress. Experts say it’s not an accident. The trove of documents released by the Department of Justice (DOJ) in relation to Jeffrey Epstein have revealed just how close the convicted child sex offender and financier was to all sorts of politicians, academics, business leaders, and other prominent figures....

item.title: The iPhone Air MagSafe battery is cheaper than ever right now
item.description:
We found the iPhone Air to have a pretty decent battery life for such a thin-and-light phone, somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But it's still a phone, arguably your most used device on a daily basis, so you may need to top it up during the day if you're using it constantly. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it def...

item.title: 6 ans après iOS, Gmail pour Android va enfin recevoir cette fonction utile
item.description: Une option présente depuis des années dans Gmail sur PC et iOS va débarquer dans l'application Android. Pas trop tôt.

item.title: Integrate raises $17M to move defense project management into the 21st century
item.description: The round was led by FPV Ventures co-founder and managing partner Wesley Chan.

item.title: Decathlon brade ce compteur vélo GPS Garmin réputé pour son autonomie record et ses fonctions avancées
item.description: Si vous comptez vous mettre sérieusement au cyclisme, il vous faut du matériel de qualité comme ce compteur vélo GPS Garmin Edge 1040 ultra-précis disponible à 389,99 euros au lieu de 449,99 euros sur Decathlon.

item.title: ExpressVPN ditches USD-only billing for fixed local rates in major update
item.description: ExpressVPN is ditching its USD-only billing model in favor of fixed local currency pricing, ending exchange rate fluctuations for users in the UK, Eurozone, and Brazil.

item.title: The New ‘Stargate’ Is Adding a Familiar Face in a Surprising Way
item.description: Plus, 'The Mummy 4' producer Tyler Gillett has high praise for the movie's script.

item.title: Super Bowl ratings revealed: How the game and Bad Bunny’s halftime show stacked up against last year
item.description: Turning Point’s halftime show featuring Kid Rock reached 5 million viewers on YouTube. Sunday night’s Super Bowl and Bad Bunny fell short of setting records for most watched U.S. broadcast and halftime show.Seattle’s 29-13 victory over New England averaged 124.9 million viewers on NBC, Peacock, Telemundo, NBC Sports Digital, and NFL+, according to Nielsen’s Big Data + Panel rating system.That fell short of the 127.7 million U.S. viewers that tuned in for Philadelphia’s 40-22 victory over Kansas City last year on Fox.However, Super Bowl 60 is the most-watched program in NBC history. The network...

item.title: How an ‘icepocalypse’ raises more questions about Meta’s biggest data center project
item.description: Donna Collins lives about 20 miles from where Meta's biggest data center is being built, in a house her family has lived in for five generations. Construction has thrown the small agricultural community in North Louisiana into the spotlight as a high-profile example of how the infrastructure behind generative AI could impact nearby residents. For […]...

item.title: A Palantir cofounder is backing a group attacking Alex Bores over his work with . . . Palantir
item.description: Current and former employees tell ‘Fast Company’ the ad campaign is driven by opposition to the Democratic hopeful’s support for AI regulation.

item.title: It's a good time to buy a gaming chair from one of my favorite brands
item.description: The President's Day sales have started, and one of my favorite gaming brands is leading the charge

item.title: Pokémon Pokopia Could Be the Switch 2’s Biggest Sleeper Hit
item.description: Pokémon Pokopia helps players stop catching creatures and instead become Poke-ecologists.

item.title: The iPhone’s anti-algorithm camera app looks better with a little processing
item.description: Something happens every time I try to use an iPhone camera like a real camera. Here's how it goes: I shoot RAW in addition to the default HEIC output, and since I have the RAW file I might as well edit it to my taste. And if I'm going to do that, I want to […]

item.title: Pokopia turns the Pokémon world into a relaxing, human-free paradise
item.description: Though catching monsters and making them fight have always been core elements of the Pokémon brand, spinoffs like the Pokémon Snap and Detective Pikachu series have stood out by approaching the franchise from different angles. In different (and often small) ways, recent mainline Pokémon titles like Sword / Shield, Scarlet / Violet, and Legends: Z-A […]...

item.title: Complyance raises $20M to help companies manage risk and compliance
item.description: Complyance raised a $20 million Series A led by GV for its AI-native compliance platform.

item.title: Humanoid robot startup Apptronik has now raised $935M at a $5B+ valuation
item.description: Apptronik has sold another $520 million in a Series A extension to existing and new investors like Google and Mercedes-Benz.

item.title: Meridian raises $17 million to remake the agentic spreadsheet
item.description: A new company called Meridian.AI has emerged from stealth with an IDE-based approach to agentic financial modeling.

item.title: Pokémon Pokopia is the game every Pokémon fan has been begging for, but you’re dead wrong if you think it’s just an Animal Crossing clone
item.description: Gen-Z slang, post-apocalyptic destruction, and multiplayer madness make Pokémon Pokopia the best demo I’ve played this year

item.title: Pokemon Pokopia is so damn cozy
item.description: Pokémon Pokopia can be described as a pocket monster-themed take on Animal Crossing with a hint of Stardew Valley thrown in for good measure. And if you're like me, that alone is probably enough to sell you on the game. However, after getting a chance to play a preview of it for around half an hour, it became immediately clear that the game's coziness levels are off the charts, but it also offers some fun twists on the genre.Co-developed by The Pokémon Company, GAME FREAK and KOEI TECMO, instead of playing as a generic trainer, you take control of a lonely Ditto who wakes up in a cave only to ...

item.title: This startup raised $250 million to help dogs live longer
item.description: Longevity Fund-backed Loyal is working toward FDA approval of a drug that could help dogs live longer, healthier lives. A canine health startup called Loyal has now raised more than $250 million to develop drugs that could help dogs—and perhaps one day humans—live longer, healthier lives.

item.title: Dyson just quietly launched a new PencilVac, and it solves the big problem I had with the original
item.description: The new PencilVac Fluffy keeps everything that's amazing about the original, and fixes it's one big issue – and it costs less, too.

item.title: Pluie diluvienne, brouillard opaque et trafic fou : la Chine dévoile un centre d’essai automobile unique au monde
item.description: Dans les coulisses de l'innovation automobile chinoise, un nouveau centre d'essais repousse les limites des systèmes d'aide à la conduite. Brouillard à couper au couteau, pluies diluviennes et situations de trafic imprévisibles : bienvenue dans le laboratoire du futur, où le groupe chinois Changan teste déjà ses véhicules.

item.title: ‘It's easier to tell them what hasn't changed in the last three to four years than what has’: LastPass CEO Karim Toubba on why it deserves your trust back after 2022 breach
item.description: LastPass has come a long way since the breach of 2022 - but has the company done enough to learn from its lessons?

item.title: The 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is 33 percent off
item.description: MicroSD Express cards are still a little hard to find, considering they're pretty new and only really started becoming popular last year once the Switch 2 came out. These upgraded versions of microSD cards are the only ones compatible with the Switch 2 for expanding its storage, os if you're already starting to feel the crunch on your console, it's worth picking one up. Samsung's P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now — you can grab the 512GB version of $80, which is 33 percent off and one of the best prices we've seen. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games ...

item.title: The ‘ultimate’ Sky TV update is coming — and it’s not just because HBO Max is being added for free
item.description: Sky customers will soon be able to access Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+ and Hayu in one neat bundle, thanks to new landmark deal.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros. par Netflix : négociations, Paramount et HBO Max, tout comprendre à la situation
item.description: C'est l'un des temps forts de cette fin d'année. Le rachat de Warner Bros. Discovery par Netflix s'est transformé en véritable feuilleton avec l'arrivée de Paramount dans les négociations. Faisons le point sur la situation.

item.title: 7 Weird Space Phenomena That Only Make Sense if Dark Matter Exists
item.description: Dark matter, science is really counting on you.

item.title: Après ses plaintes contre X et Grok, un député français interdit de territoire américain
item.description: Les États-Unis de Donald Trump ont la liberté d'expression sélective. Un député français, Éric Bothorel, est depuis peu interdit de séjour outre Atlantique. Son tort : avoir dénoncé à la justice les pratiques de X (anciennement Twitter).

item.title: World of Warcraft change ses voix et provoque la colère de ses joueurs
item.description: La dernière extension de World of Warcraft fait grincer des dents. Pour cause, les joueurs ont eu la mauvaise surprise de découvrir que de nombreux acteurs historiques du jeu ont vu leurs voix remplacées. Un changement qui serait dû à la nouvelle politique de Microsoft concernant l’usage de l’IA.

item.title: Saks closing stores: Saks Fifth Avenue and Neiman Marcus locations are shuttering in 9 states. See the full list
item.description: The luxury retail company continues to close locations across its portfolio. Liquidation sales are expected to begin this month and conclude before May. In the wake of a January Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing from Saks Global, owner of Saks Fifth Avenue and Neiman Marcus, the luxury retailer has begun to close a number of stores across its portfolio of brands. Last month, for instance, the company announced the shuttering of many of its outlet stores....

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 drops to $299 ahead of Presidents' Day
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch now that you can save with Presidents' Day deals. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, inc...

item.title: Thousands of Volvo customers possibly affected in major data breach - 17,000 affected, here's what we know
item.description: The Conduent breach keeps getting worse, with Volvo North America now involved.

item.title: Since I switched back to a mainly wired PC gaming setup, these cheap soundbar pads have helped me keep a semblance of tidiness

item.title: El Paso flights resume after Mexican cartel drones reportedly trigger airspace closure
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration has lifted its temporary closure to the airspace around El Paso International Airport in Texas, after originally saying that all flights in and out of the airport would be grounded for 10 days. No explanation for the closure was given, beyond a vague reference to "Special Security Reasons." CBS News reported […]

item.title: Hubble Zooms in on the Mysterious Egg Nebula, and It’s More Spectacular Than Ever
item.description: The stunning image captures a star's dying moments wrapped in dust, light, and a cosmic conundrum still waiting to be solved.

item.title: Get more screen space for almost half price: This 15.6-inch UPerfect portable monitor with full HD display is now just $69
item.description: UPerfect 15.6-inch portable monitor with a 1080P FHD display is nearly half price at Newegg, just $69.

item.title: Nicolas Cage Explains the Allure of Watching ‘Spider-Noir’ in Black and White
item.description: The MGM+ and Prime Video Spider-Man show starring the Oscar winner comes out this spring.

item.title: Avec près de 350 € de remise, l’iPhone 16 Plus devient enfin plus recommandable
item.description: L’iPhone 16 Plus reste une très bonne référence (notée 8/10 chez nous) grâce à sa finition premium, ses fonctions Pro, son grand écran et sa bonne autonomie. Avec un prix de lancement à 1 119 euros, il est aujourd'hui plus recommandable en tombant à 773,17 euros.

item.title: How to Set Up an Apple Watch for Your Kids (2026)
item.description: Want to give your children an easy way to contact you—without giving them a smartphone? Family Setup on WatchOS can help.

item.title: Mullvad VPN review: Near-total privacy with a few sacrifices
item.description: Mullvad, a virtual private network (VPN) named after the Swedish word for "mole," is often recognized as one of the best VPNs for privacy. I put it on my best VPN list for exactly that reason. I've got huge respect for the extra lengths Mullvad goes to in order to ensure its user's privacy. To give you a preview, Mullvad is one of the few VPNs — other than my normal privacy recommendation, Proton VPN — that lets users pay entirely in cash. But even Proton VPN asks for an email address to make an account and uses a few marketing cookies on its own website. Mullvad represents every account as a ...

item.title: ‘New collar’ work is rising: These high-paying jobs don’t need a college degree. Here are 10 of them
item.description: You can snag a six-figure salary without a Bachelor’s: These roles, ranging from sales and marketing to art, fall somewhere between blue and white collar. Job insecurity is real: More than half of American workers (54%) say insecurity about their job is causing significant stress at work, while more than a third (39%) say they worry they about losing their job due to changes in government policies, according to the American Psychological Association’s 2025 Work in America survey. Layoffs are reportedly at an all-time high since 2009, along with the lowest hiring on record in the U.S. since tha...

item.title: Social media lawsuits are putting Section 230 to the test
item.description: Courts are weighing whether Meta, Google, and other platforms can be held responsible for algorithm-driven harm to children and teens. Lawyers for social media companies will be working overtime in the coming weeks as several major trials get underway addressing the potential harms to children caused by popular sites and apps.
